statements: DELETE FROM drug_sales WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND sale_amount > 50.00;
DELETE FROM drug_inventory WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND units_in_stock < 50;
DELETE FROM drug_sales WHERE quantity_sold < 10 AND sale_id = 100;
DELETE FROM drug_inventory WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' OR (units_in_stock < 20 AND expiry_date < '2022-06-30');
DELETE FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 500 AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sales WHERE quantity <= 10 AND total_price > 1000;
